p: Also, the plant has cytotoxicity and insecticide properties [ 223]. H. pectinata has an important neurogenic and inflammatory orofacial antinociceptive effects, without interference in the motor performance. The mechanism is currently unknown but seems to be related to vanilloid and glutamate receptors. The opioid system seems unlikely to participate in the antinociception caused by the extract [ 224]. The local application of dental gel based on H. pectinata has anti-inflammatory effect and also prevents alveolar bone resorption and weight loss in animals with periodontitis [ 223]. The healing effect of H. pectinata suggests that this plant may have antileishmanial action [ 219].
